name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life, comfortable over-ear design, and crystal-clear audio quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and water resistance up to 50 meters. Compatible with iOS and Android devices.

name: Organic Coffee Beans - 1kg
description: Single-origin Arabica coffee beans, freshly roasted for rich flavor and aroma. Sustainably sourced from premium coffee farms. Perfect for espresso and filter coffee.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: High-back ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable armrests, and 360-degree swivel. Features breathable mesh material for comfort during long work sessions.

name: Portable Power Bank - 20000mAh
description: High-capacity power bank with fast charging technology, USB-C and USB-A ports. Can charge smartphones up to 4 times. Compact design perfect for travel.

name: Ceramic Non-Stick Cookware Set
description: 10-piece ceramic cookware set including pots, pans, and lids. Non-toxic, non-stick surface that requires less oil. Dishwasher safe and oven safe up to 400Â°F.

name: Yoga Mat - Premium Thick
description: Extra thick 10mm yoga mat with non-slip surface for all yoga poses. Made from eco-friendly TPE material. Includes carrying strap for easy transportation.

name: LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Features USB charging port and touch controls. Energy-efficient with long-lasting LED bulbs.

name: Wireless Phone Charger Stand
description: Fast wireless charging stand compatible with iPhone and Android phones. Adjustable viewing angle, supports up to 15W charging speed. Sleek, modern design.

name: Premium Backpack - Water Resistant
description: Durable backpack with multiple compartments, laptop sleeve, and water-resistant material. Ergonomic padded straps for comfort. Perfect for work, travel, or school.
